section.name: Plexus Maven Plugin
section.p: This plugin provide some help with Maven : goals

subsection.name: Component Descriptor Generation
subsection.p: A mojo will generate a component descriptor file.
The component descriptor will contains all component defined with javadoc tags in your sources.

Add this plugin (Automatically executes within the lifecycle phase: process-sources) as this :
<plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId> <artifactId>plexus-maven-plugin</artifactId> <executions> <execution> <goals> <goal>descriptor</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> </plugin>

subsection.name: Component Report
subsection.p: A reporting mojo will generated a report on available components (sample).

Add this plugin in your reporting section as this :
<plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId> <artifactId>plexus-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin>
